casebody.data:
REID
v.
DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS. No. 473P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Heather H. Freeman, Associate Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of August 2005 by Plaintiff "Petition for Discretionary Review/Petition for Writ of Certiorari":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
